mobiles.name: Gatekeeper
mobiles.long_description: The gatekeeper is here snoozing on the job.
mobiles.description:
The gatekeeper is underpayed overweight and not too bright. He snores very  
loudly and occasionally rubs his chin. Well better kill him now I guess.

mobiles.name: rat
mobiles.long_description: The rat sits on its haunches here, thinking about its next meal.
mobiles.description: The rat looks as if it hasn't eaten in days....it contemplates eating YOU!

mobiles.name: Prison Guard
mobiles.long_description: The Prison Guard stands here keeping an eye out for unruly behavior.
mobiles.description:
The Guard is a highly trained specialist in torture and hand to hand
combat.  Selectively chosen from the ranks of cityguards he is the best of  
the elite.

mobiles.name: Prison Worker
mobiles.long_description: The Prison Worker is here working as little as possible.
mobiles.description:
The Prison Worker looks almost exactly like a janitor you have seen in  
Midgaard!

mobiles.name: Cell Guard
mobiles.long_description: The Cell Guard stands here, he is staring icily at you.
mobiles.description:
The Cell Guard is one tough dude, outfitted to keep anything prisoner in.
And for that matter anyone not wanted out! He is about 7'8'' and towers
above  you.

mobiles.name: prisoner
mobiles.long_description: The prisoner stands here, his will broken.
mobiles.description:
The prisoner has been doing hard time for a while. He has the haggard look
of an inmate with nothing to lose.

mobiles.name: cockroach
mobiles.long_description: The huge black cockroach skitters about.
mobiles.description:
The huge black cockroach looks as if it must eat alot of food to support that hu
ge body. It is at least 2 feet long. Do you have some bug spray?

mobiles.name: flunky
mobiles.long_description: A flunky skulks about waiting for some orders.
mobiles.description:
The flunky is the lowest ranking scum of the prison. He is a shame to all. kinda
 makes ya want to put him out of his misery.

mobiles.name: Stoned Guard
mobiles.long_description: The mob stands here, completely clueless.
mobiles.description:
The guard looks as if he has had a little too much to smoke after work today. He
 must have eyes but all you can see are slits with puffy bloodshot teary......we
ll you get the idea.

mobiles.name: gangster
mobiles.long_description: The gangster is here yelling orders to his flunkies.
mobiles.description: Sadly the gangster was caught not paying taxes to the mayor.

mobiles.name: Brad Warden
mobiles.long_description: Brad the Warden is here contemplating the death and execution of another prisoner.
mobiles.description:
Brad the Warden looks like the all Midgaard guy. Voted most likely to
succeed  by his class on the Campus he was turned down at job after job.  
Finally he found one he can really get into, the torture and murder of the
weak. Brad loves to  lust after Trixie. And after looking at him you
notice he  has a preferance for  women's clothing.

mobiles.name: Trixie
mobiles.long_description: Trixie sits here dreaming about Brad the Warden.
mobiles.description:
She looks like your average, everyday, dumb, closed minded secretary.Great
body.  No mind. And a great set of.....paper clips.

mobiles.name: Steve maintenance man
mobiles.long_description: Steve the maintenance man is here doing a whole lot of nothing.
mobiles.description:
Steve is a career maintenance man. He likes to put new pinups on the wall,
he likes to order supplies from Terry and he HATES to work. All of which
is quite  evident. in this room

mobiles.name: Butch helper
mobiles.long_description: Butch the helper is here doing all of Steve's work.
mobiles.description:
Butch is a young lad with all the enthusiasm that ignorance can provide.
He works long and hard to keep this prison in working order.

mobiles.name: Wendy Cook
mobiles.long_description: Wendy stands here dreaming up a beautiful meal for all the inmates.
mobiles.description:
Wendy is a gorgeous young lady with flowing long auburn hair wrapped into
a loose hairnet. She brings her light and salvation to work with
her everyday..   Her son Jacob.

mobiles.name: Steam Monster
mobiles.long_description: A swirl of mist is wafting about here.
mobiles.description:
The Steam Monster is glittering although there is no light. It swirls about and 
about almost charming you in the process......

mobiles.name: Larry armsmaster
mobiles.long_description: Larry the armsmaster is here, wanting to sell you some armor.
mobiles.description:
Larry is not the best paid person in here so he supplements his income with a li
ttle on the side buying and selling.

mobiles.name: Thomas weaponmaster
mobiles.long_description: Thomas the weaponmaster is here selling his goods.
mobiles.description:
Thomas the weaponmaster is an old cell guard who has become an expert at all the 
weapons at his diposal. The next step in his career was to become the weaponsmas
ter. Unfortunately he has to resort to selling arms to pay the rent.

mobiles.name: slice bologna
mobiles.long_description: [processed aura] a slice of bologna is here mouldering.
mobiles.description:
You look at the slice of bologna and it curls itself into a tube and
skitters away.

mobiles.name: Muslim Cleric
mobiles.long_description: A muslim cleric is here, giving you peace and a sense of well being.
mobiles.description:
The Muslim Cleric is from a different reality that has been thrust into
this time and place. He makes do with the clothes on his back and the
hope that more and more worthy people like you will come and visit.

mobiles.name: towel boy
mobiles.long_description: The towel boy stands here with his back to the wall.
mobiles.description:
What an awful job the boy has, he has to watch these people drudge in and
out of the shower all day long. But he keeps a few handy items on hand.

mobiles.name: Executioner
mobiles.long_description: The Executioner stands here waiting to kill.
mobiles.description:
An ageless demon with no face and no soul.....he is feared by all but he
is  really just a lonely lost being. All he really wants is a friend for  
eternity.

mobiles.name: Thing
mobiles.long_description: A black thing is here.
mobiles.description:
You stare at the center of the black mass but all you can see is a rainbow
of colors swirling from the outside to the inside....swirling...swirling....

mobiles.name: Mnemoth
mobiles.long_description: A huge bronze Dragon is snoozing here with one eye open looking at you!
mobiles.description: Since you are a lesser being than Mnemoth you cannot comprehend what you see here.

mobiles.name: Terry
mobiles.long_description: Terry the salesman is here pitching a product.
mobiles.description:
Terry is a young guy who works for Environmental Chemical Corporation. He sells 
Chemicals to Steve in the prison maintenance. He also likes to stroll the
grounds and flirt with Wendy his wife.

objects.name: gate key
objects.description: A metal key rests here.

objects.name: short sword
objects.description: A dangerous short sword rests here.

objects.name: pack of cigarettes
objects.description: A pack of smokes have been dropped here carelessly.

extra_descriptions.description: The surgeon General warns that smoking may be harmful to your health

objects.name: Trojan wrapper
objects.description: A piece of crinkled foil rests here.

objects.name: soap rope
objects.description: Some soap on a rope is here.

objects.name: tricks
objects.description: An enchanted bag lies here

objects.name: unknown ember ring
objects.description: A mystical ring of burning embers is here.

objects.name: hatchling ember ring
objects.description: A ring of burning embers is here.

objects.name: Hatchling robe
objects.description: An ivory robe lies here.

objects.name: filet rat
objects.description: A juicy filet of rat lies here.

objects.name: hatchling cloak
objects.description: A  hatchling cloak lies here.

objects.name: hatchling shirt
objects.description: A hatchling shirt lies here

objects.name: helmet
objects.description: A hatchling helmet rests here.

objects.name: hatchling leggings
objects.description: Some hatchling leggings lie here.

objects.name: hatchling boots
objects.description: A pair of hatchling boots lie here.

objects.name: hatchling gloves
objects.description: A pair of hatchling gloves lie here.

objects.name: hatchling sleeves
objects.description: Some hatchling sleeves lie here.

objects.name: shield hatchling
objects.description: A hatchling shield has been carelessly left here.

objects.name: hatchling belt
objects.description: A hatchling belt has been dropped here.

objects.name: hatchling bracer
objects.description: A hatchling bracer has been left here.

objects.name: lucky charm hatchling
objects.description: A lucky charm has been left here.

objects.name: Starter Kit
objects.description: A starter kit has been dropped here.

extra_descriptions.description:
This kit has been brought to you by Environmental Chemical corporation

Ask For Terry

objects.name: fountain water
objects.description: An intricately carved ivory fountain is here, filled with holy water.

objects.name: crumpled piece paper
objects.description: A crumpled piece of paper has been left here.

extra_descriptions.description:
Dear John,
I am sorry but it is over between us.  I have run off with Chris the druggist.  
He is really groovy and you are very retro.  I left because you spend too
much  time on your job.  Even though you are the town crier you should not
let that get in the way of our relationship.

Diana


PS I have given the kids to the cannibals in Westreen.

objects.name: Desk
objects.description: A large cluttered desk with all sorts of paperwork is here.

extra_descriptions.description: Don't mess with the desk it is not yours.

objects.name: Cell key
objects.description: A cell block key rusts here

objects.name: joint
objects.description: A big fat joint lays here burning.

objects.name: py check paycheck
objects.description: A paycheck is here, longing for you to take it.

objects.name: dirty mop
objects.description: A dirty mop has been set against the wall.

objects.name: large battle axe
objects.description: A dangerous large battle axe rests here.

objects.name: spiked wristguard
objects.description: A wicked looking spiked wrist guard lies here.

objects.name: titanium leggings
objects.description: A pair of strong leggings has been left here.

objects.name: titanium sleeves
objects.description: A set of strong sleeves has been dropped here.

objects.name: prison uniform
objects.description: A prison uniform lies here all starched up.

objects.name: titanium shield
objects.description: A shield of titanium rests here.

objects.name: dagger curved
objects.description: A curved dagger lies here.

objects.name: ring guardian
objects.description: A pitch black ring with sparkles of color lies on the ground here.

objects.name: iron manacle
objects.short_description: a set of wrought iron manacles
objects.description: A set of wrought iron manacles lay in the corner here.

objects.name: zip gun
objects.description: A home made zip gun lies here.

objects.name: coins gold pile
objects.description: A pile of gold coins are scattered about.

objects.name: heels pink sequin
objects.short_description: a set of pink sequined high heels
objects.description: A set aof fabulous looking heels lie here.

objects.name: scarf pink cashmire
objects.description: A pink cashmire scarf has been left here, a definite plus for anyone's wardrobe.

objects.name: bra push up
objects.description: A busty bra lies here.

objects.name: coveralls
objects.description: A workers coveralls lay here.

objects.name: indians baseball hat
objects.description: A baseball hat with the tribe logo on it is here.

objects.name: tool belt
objects.description: A tool belt lies here.

objects.name: golden hairnet
objects.description: A pile of golden netting is here.

objects.name: baby jacob
objects.description: baby jacob lies here.

objects.name: scroll persuasion
objects.description: A very delicate scroll set in silver leafs lies here.

objects.name: Gown virginity
objects.description: A gown of virginity has been forgotten here.

objects.name: packet boiler water treatment
objects.short_description: a packet of boiler water treatment
objects.description: A packet of boiler water treatment has been dropped here.

objects.name: dreadlocks
objects.description: A massive pile of dreadlocks rest here.

objects.name: Axe destruction
objects.description: A massive blood-stained axe of immeasurable age lies here.

objects.name: trash can
objects.description: A trash can is here so give a hoot and don't pollute!

objects.name: chopping block
objects.description: A chopping block covered in blood and gore is here.

objects.name: head severed
objects.description: A severed head of a previous victim lies in the corner.

extra_descriptions.description:
Hmmm this head looks like it has been here a while. It has maggots crawling in a
nd out of the eyes. Better put it down........

objects.name: rusty shower
objects.description: A rusty showerhead drips water on the floor here.

objects.name: pill lude
objects.description: A pill called a "lude" lies here collecting dust.

objects.name: flask vile mist
objects.description: A flas full of vile liquid has been laid to rest here.

objects.name: invisibility staff
objects.description: A twig of an oak tree lies here.

objects.name: drum
objects.description: A big yellow 55 gallon drum sits here.

extra_descriptions.description:
The proudly states that it was purchased from environmental chemical Corporation
.

objects.name: briefcase
objects.description: A briefcase has been left here

objects.name: Ball point pen
objects.description: A fine ball point pen lies here.

objects.name: quart
objects.description: A quart of astrosol#3 has been left here.

objects.name: quart Natural
objects.description: A quart of Natural 50 has been dropped here, now you can smell oranges!

objects.name: Can ec50
objects.description: A can of EC50 is here looking dangerous.

objects.name: hatchling ember ring
objects.description: A ring of burning embers lies here.

objects.name: hatchling cloak
objects.description: A hatchling cloak lies here.

objects.name: hatchling bracer
objects.description: A hatchling bracer lies here.

objects.name: large desk
objects.description: A large oaken desk is in the corner here.

objects.name: fountain water holy
objects.description: A carved ivory fountain is here filled with Holy Water.

rooms.name: Entrance to the Prison
rooms.description:
You are standing in the shadow of a formiddable building. There are no
windows only slits to let in light. In the distance you hear screams that
send chills down your spine.

rooms.name: The Prison of Midgaard
rooms.description:
You are standing in front of a large prison. It looks as if what goes in  
never comes out. A large rusty gate is to the north. A plaque is on the wall.

extra_descriptions.description:
Welcome to the Prison of Midgaard where our motto is "Work sets you free.".


This prison designed and built by
Flar the Dragonmaster-----in the days before the birth of his son Jacob
And converted to this format by Asena.....

rooms.name: A Bright Intersection
rooms.description:
This appears to be a central intersection of sorts. You see light to the
east  and west while to the north a dark hallway extends.

rooms.name: A Dark Intersection
rooms.description:
You are standing in a dark intersection. There appears to be cellblocks to
the east and west of here. The hallway continues north and south.

rooms.name: A long hallway
rooms.description:
You are standing in a long hallway. There is a misty smell to the east.
The hallway continues north.

rooms.name: A long hallway
rooms.description:
You are standing in a long hallway. The hallway continues to the north and  
south.

rooms.name: A long hallway
rooms.description:
You are standing in a long hallway. A pungent aroma is wafting in from the west 
here. The hallway continues to the north and south.

rooms.name: A long hallway
rooms.description:
You are standing in a long hallway. The hallway continues to the north and  
south.

rooms.name: A long hallway
rooms.description:
You are standing in a long hallway. The hallway continues to the north and
south.  You can see a yard of sorts to the east and west.

rooms.name: Executioners room
rooms.description:
This is the last room some of the prisoners will ever see. There is a
large block in the middle of the room which is used for seperating the
head from the body. The stench is overwhelming here.

rooms.name: The Cleric's Hold
rooms.description:
You are in the secret room of the muslim cleric. there are all sorts of  
religious artifacts on the walls here. This is a very peaceful room.

rooms.name: A quiet hallway
rooms.description:
You are standing in a quiet hallway. There is a large painting of the
Mayor on the wall here.

extra_descriptions.description:
The picture of the mayor has been eloquently doodled upon. Scrolled upon
the  bottom of the painting are the words: THE MAYOR IS A FINK!!

rooms.name: A quiet hallway
rooms.description: You are standing in a quiet hallway. There is a door to the south here.

rooms.name: The Weapons Room
rooms.description:
You are standing in the Weapons Room. This is where the guards store their  
equipment after their shift is over. There is an array of swords and axes  
stacked on a shelf behind the counter.

rooms.name: A quiet hallway
rooms.description: You are standing in a quiet hallway. The hallway continues to the east and west.

rooms.name: Reception area
rooms.description:
You are standing in the main reception room. There is a lovely couch and a  
drinking fountain here. The administration Hallway leads to the south.

rooms.name: A broom closet
rooms.description:
You are in a small broom closet. There are old rags and other odds and
ends stacked on the shelves here.

rooms.name: Spiral staircase
rooms.description:
You are standing in what appears to be a spiral stone staircase. You smell  
the pungent odor of Cannibus burning here.

rooms.name: Spiral staircase
rooms.description:
You are in a spiral staircase made of stone. You hear people laughing above you,
 and the smell of cannibus is getting stronger.

rooms.name: Smokey Tower
rooms.description:
You can feel yourself getting very relaxed as you take deep breaths of the smoke
in here.  Man.....aren't there ANY windows?

rooms.name: The administration hallway
rooms.description:
You are standing in an administration hallway. The hallway continues to
the north and south.

rooms.name: The administration hallway
rooms.description:
You are standing in what appears to be a long corridor. The hallway continues to
the north and south

rooms.name: The administration hallway
rooms.description:
You are standing in what appears to be a long corridor. The hallway continues to
the north and south.

rooms.name: The administration hallway
rooms.description:
You are standing in what appears to be a long corridor. You hear the
clicking of a typewriter to the south.

rooms.name: Warden's Office
rooms.description: You are in the receptionist's office.It smells like pot pourri in here.

rooms.name: Warden's chamber
rooms.description:
You are standing in the Wardens chamber. There are pictures of all the
inmates  he has had executed on the walls. A large stack of pictures is on  
the floor as well.

rooms.name: A quiet hallway
rooms.description:
You are standing in a quiet hallway. There is a large painting of Warden
Brad on the wall here. The hallway continues to the east and west.

extra_descriptions.description:
This man is a tyrant as evident by the portrait of him slaying and
disemboweling for fun.

rooms.name: A quiet hallway
rooms.description: You are standing in a quiet hallway. There is a door to the south here.

rooms.name: The Armory
rooms.description:
You are standing in the armory. This is where the guards come and check
there  equipment when their shift is over. You see a stack of shields
behind  the counter here.

rooms.name: Triple junction
rooms.description:
you are standing in a triple junction. A maintenance hallway extends to
the  south and a dimly lit hallway to the east.

rooms.name: Dimly lit hallway
rooms.description:
You are standing in a dimly lit hallway.  It seems as though maintenance  
ought to check on these lights in here.

rooms.name: A broom closet
rooms.description:
You are standing in a small broom closet. There are absolutely no brooms
here.  Go figure?!?

rooms.name: Spiral staircase
rooms.description:
You are standing in at the base of a staircase made of stone. You can
smell tobacco wafting down from above.

rooms.name: Spiral staircase
rooms.description:
You are standing on a staircase made of stone. You can hear cursing and laughing
from above.

rooms.name: The sneaky tower
rooms.description:
You are at the top of a spiral staircase. All around you are stacks and
stacks of encyclopedias. It seems the only use they have had lately is
being sit upon for the nightly poker game.

rooms.name: A maintenance hallway
rooms.description:
You are standing in a long maintenance hallway. You smell solvents and
other manly stuff in the air.

rooms.name: A maintenance hallway
rooms.description:
You are standing in a maintenance hallway. You smell solvents and other
manly stuff.

rooms.name: A maintenance hallway
rooms.description:
You are standing in a maintenance hallway. You smell solvents and other  
manly stuff.

rooms.name: A maintenance hallway
rooms.description:
You are standing in a maintenance hallway. There is a door to the south.
There is a sign on the wall here.

extra_descriptions.description:
****ATTENTION****
Salesmen seen by appointment only!!
If you dare to enter without an appointment
you will be killed....
mgmnt.

rooms.name: Prison maintenance
rooms.description:
You are standing in room FULL of all sorts of maintenance items. There are cases
and cases of Environmental Chemical Corporation aerosols here.

rooms.name: The boiler room
rooms.description:
You are in the boiler room. There is a tremendous steam boiler smack dab in the 
middle of the room. You have an overwhelming sense of forboding here.

rooms.name: Guard Room
rooms.description:
You are in what appears to be a guard room. There is a huge locked door to  
the west.

rooms.name: A cellblock
rooms.description:
This is the reason this prison is here, to keep these people from getting 
out. You start to wonder if you can ever get out yourself. There are cells
to the north and south.

rooms.name: A cellblock
rooms.description:
This is the reason the prison is here, to keep these people from getting
out. You start to wonder if you will ever get out yourself. There are
cells to the north and south.

rooms.name: A cellblock
rooms.description:
This is the reason the prison is here, to keep the people from getting out. You 
start to wonder of you will ever get out yourself. There are cells to the north 
and south. A small alcove leads to the west.

rooms.name: An alcove
rooms.description: This room is absolutely barren.........

rooms.name: A cell
rooms.description:
You are standing in a cell. There is a pile of straw on the floor and
crude drawings on the wall.

rooms.name: A cell
rooms.description:
You are standing in a cell. There ais a pile of straw on the floor and
some crude drawings on the wall.

rooms.name: A cell
rooms.description:
You are standing in a cell. There is a pile of straw on the floor and some crude
drawings on the wall.

rooms.name: A cell
rooms.description:
You are standing in a cell. There is a pile of straw on the floor and some crude
drawings on the wall.

rooms.name: A cell
rooms.description:
You are standing in a cell. There is a pile of straw on the floor and some crude
drawings on the wall.

rooms.name: A cell
rooms.description:
You are standing in a cell. there is a pile of straw on the floor and some crude
drawings on the wall.

rooms.name: A Guard Room
rooms.description:
You are in what appears to be a guardroom. there is a huge locked door to
the east.

rooms.name: A cellblock
rooms.description:
This is the reason the prison is here, to keep people from getting out.
You start to wonder if you will ever get out yourself. there are cells to
the north and south.

rooms.name: A cellblock
rooms.description:
This is the reason the prison is here, to keep people from getting out.
you start to wonder if you will ever get out yourself. There are cells to
the north and south.

rooms.name: A cellblock
rooms.description:
this is the reason the prison is here, to keep people from getting out.
You start to wonder if you will ever get out yourself. there are cells to
the north and south. A small alcove leads to the east.

rooms.name: An alcove
rooms.description:
You are in a small alcove. It appears as if someone has been living here. Piles 
of feces are in the corners and the smell of urine overpowers you.

rooms.name: A cell
rooms.description:
You are standing in a cell. there is a pile of straw on the floor and
crude drawings on the wall.

rooms.name: A cell
rooms.description:
You are standing in a cell. there is a pile of straw on the floor and
crude drawings on the wall.

rooms.name: A cell
rooms.description:
You are standing in a cell. There is a pile of straw on the floor and
crude drawings on the wall.

rooms.name: A cell
rooms.description:
You are standing in a cell. There is a pile of straw on the floor and
crude drawings on the wall.

rooms.name: A cell
rooms.description:
You are standing in a cell. there is a pile of straw on the floor and
crude drawings on the wall.

rooms.name: A cell
rooms.description:
You are standing in a cell. there is a pile of straw on the floor and some crude
drawings on the wall.

rooms.name: The Yard
rooms.description:
You are in the exercise yard. You can hear the hustle and bustle of
Midgaard just over the wall. You also hear the muted tones of the
prisoners whispers.

rooms.name: Northeast Corner of the yard
rooms.description:
You are standing in the northeast corner of the yard. There are
Bloodstains on the wall here.

rooms.name: Eastern end of the yard
rooms.description:
You are standing in the eastern end of the yard. Prisoners are in little groups 
all around the yard.

rooms.name: Eastern end of the yard
rooms.description:
You are in the eastern end of the yard. There is a large wall right here to the 
east. Prisoners are in little groups all over the yard here.

rooms.name: Eastern end of the yard
rooms.description:
You are standing in the eastern end of the yard. There is a huge wall right here
to the east. there are groups of prisoners all over the yard.

rooms.name: Southeastern corner of the yard
rooms.description: You are standing in the southeastern corner of the yard.

rooms.name: Southern end of the yard
rooms.description:
You are standing in the southern end of the yard. Prisoners are standing
in little groups all around the yard.

rooms.name: Middle of the yard
rooms.description: You are standing in the middle of the exercise yard.

rooms.name: Middle of the yard
rooms.description: You are standing in the middle of the exercise yard.

rooms.name: Middle of the yard
rooms.description: You are standing in the middle of the exercise yard.

rooms.name: The yard
rooms.description:
You are standing in the exercise yard. You can hear the hustle and bustle
of Midgaard just over the wall. You also hear the muted tones of the  
prisoners whispers.

rooms.name: Northwestern corner of the yard
rooms.description:
You are standing in the northwestern corner of the yard. There are groups
of prisoners huddled all around the yard. It seems as though you are an  
outsider here.

rooms.name: Western end of the yard
rooms.description:
You are standing along the western end of the wall. You can see groups of  
prisoners huddled all over the yard.

rooms.name: Western end of the yard
rooms.description:
You are standing on the western end of the yard. You can see groups of prisoners
huddled together all over the yard. To the south you can hear a commotion.

rooms.name: Break in the western wall
rooms.description:
You are standing on the western end of the yard. There appears to be a
hole in the wall to the west.

rooms.name: Southwestern corner of the wall.
rooms.description:
You are standing in the southwest corner of the yard. This is where the beatings
must take place as evident by the corpses hanging on the wall.

rooms.name: Southern end of the yard
rooms.description:
You are standing in the southern end of the yard. Prisoners are standing
in little groups all around the yard.

rooms.name: Middle of the yard
rooms.description:
You are standing in the middle of the yard. You can see little groups of  
prisoners all around the yard.

rooms.name: Middle of the yard
rooms.description:
You are standing in the middle of the yard. You can see little groups of  
prisoners all around the yard.

rooms.name: Middle of the yard
rooms.description:
You are standing in the middle of the yard. You can see little groups of  
prisoners all around the yard.

rooms.name: Inside the hole
rooms.description:
You are standing inside a small hole dug into the wall. It looks as if this
might be some kind of escape route. Better hope the person digging it is
not around!

rooms.name: Deep dank hall
rooms.description:
You are in a passage that leads to the showers. The walls are moist and
slimy here. You can smell fear and decay......better leave now.

rooms.name: The showers
rooms.description:
This is the most feared and hated place in the entire prison. That must be
why all the prisoners look so dirty. The walls here are covered in slime
and blood.

extra_descriptions.description:
This is what WATER comes out of.........duhhhh.

If you are thirsty you could probably drink from it.

rooms.name: The Cafeteria
rooms.description:
This is the place where everyone comes to chow down. Looks like the
specials today are roast rat and slime ball soup. The smell here is
EXTREMELY offensive.

rooms.name: The Kitchen
rooms.description:
This is where the finest chefs in all of Midgaard prepare the feasts daily
for all the lovely prisoners. It seems as if the chefs, feasts and lovely  
prisoners are long since gone.

rooms.name: Flar's Gateway to heaven
rooms.description:
You are standing in a huge Warehouse. This must be where Flar spends his
days working. From here you can see a desk in the corner and a large sign
on the wall.
